three times a week on non-consecutive days, has thus been proposed as an alternative to daily 
supplementation.
A Cochrane systematic review (182) assessing the benefits and harms of intermittent supplements 
of iron alone or in combination with folic acid or other vitamins and minerals in pregnant women 
on neonatal and pregnancy outcomes found that there was no detectable difference between
